name: The Giant - Environmental pollution
description:
The game is about how pollution is destroying the world and the animals that live in it. In this case we control "The Giant" that as he goes eating he grows and destroys everything in his path.

The message that we want to give with this game is difficult to explain without advancing the plot of the character, nevertheless in the last level it is explained and it exemplifies the reason of "The Giant".

Made by a team of 5 people, in Unity and 3D models in Blender.

If you like, help us to promote this game. Record a gameplay, or recommend on game pages.  Help us with the translation, and report any faults they find. If they do not like to let us know, we need the feedback.
